underlying_goal: To document the standard lie detector configurations in the project's CLAUDE.md file.
primary_success: Quickly updated the project's core documentation (CLAUDE.md) to specify the default and ablation lie detectors to use for experiments, including their specific registry IDs.
brief_summary: The user asked to clarify in CLAUDE.md which lie detectors should be used by default. Claude updated the documentation to specify the primary benign-only detector and the secondary ablation detector trained on sandbagging outputs, including their full paths for clarity.
